scripts.build: for file in background.js content.js devtools.js injected.js sidebar-pane.js; do browserify src/$file -t [ babelify --stage 0 ] -o dist/$file & done
scripts.start: for file in background.js content.js devtools.js injected.js sidebar-pane.js; do watchify src/$file -t [ babelify --stage 0 ] -o dist/$file & done; wait
